  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Point ballPos)
      Innitialise the variables
      Parameters:
      drawArea - rectangle area
      brickCount - no.of bricks
      lineCount - layer of the wall in game
      brickDimensionRatio - the ratio of the brick present (height & width)
      ballPos - ball position

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      private Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      Parameters:
      drawArea - rectangle area
      brickCnt - no.of bricks
      lineCnt - layer of walls in game
      brickSizeRatio - ratio of the brick (height & width)
      type - a type of brick
      Returns:
      return to the single type of brick

      drawArea - rectangle area
      brickCnt - no.of bricks
      lineCnt - layer of walls in game
      brickSizeRatio - ratio of the brick (height & width)
      typeA - a type of brick
      typeB - another type of brick
